name: Air Products and Chemicals, Inc.
description: Air Products and Chemicals, Inc. is a leading global industrial gases company that provides essential products and services to a diverse range of industries. Founded in 1940 and headquartered in Allentown, Pennsylvania, the company specializes in the production of atmospheric gases such as nitrogen, oxygen, and argon, as well as a variety of process gases for industrial operations. Air Products is committed to innovation and sustainability, offering solutions that enhance energy efficiency and reduce emissions. The company serves customers in various sectors, including energy, healthcare, and manufacturing, and plays a key role in supporting the transition to clean energy through its involvement in hydrogen production and carbon capture technologies. With a strong global presence and a focus on safety and reliability, Air Products continues to lead in the development of innovative gas solutions that meet the evolving needs of its customers worldwide.
